My thoughts and feelings about this game came into place when I switched from xbox to PC, I couldn’t stand playing this game after switching because of how grindy and unnecessary cruel it is to newer players, which is why I reccomend getting it on sale. It can take a couple hundred hours to unlock all the perks and killers (without microtransactions), which is the main “meta” of this game. The perks have a horrible power creep problem with 10-15 perks severely outweighing the other few hundred, and it feels that only one perk out of the 24 added every year actually gets a decent amount of use because of all the other generalist perks that can be brought in every situation. Perks drastically impact how a match can go, which makes unlocking them all a chore.

Matchmaking is busted, with it being tailored around performance and not rank, so newer players end up going ip against 2,000+ hour gods. Ranks don’t mean anything too, the devs for some reason haven’t implemented a rewards for reaching higher ranks.

Characters are locked behind tedios grindy currency or paywalls, even the original DLC, I can understand licensed killers like myers and Freddy being locked behind paywalls, but it makes no sense to make the original killers and dlc require that much grind, you already have the shop which I inagine brings in a decent amount of revenue.

The actual game can get rather repetetive on both sides with the newer killer designs being specialists who can sometimes do something interesting for the game, but fall overall (Blight and Demogorgon for example), ironically the most fun killers to get chased by are the higher tier ones, as you have to mix up your movements and hiding. Chase killers being more fun to play against then information or stealth ones. The maps don’t help as BVHR doesn’t want to remove or look at problematic maps like haddonfield or The game.

While I think it’s a decent game, I reccomend getting it on sale or staying off of public matches just to mess around with friends.

This game has a lot of issues but it was fun. It still is fun if you don't care about the balance and if you're not hardcore competitive. I could write about so much more.

I played lots of hours so I did get my money's worth. Here are some things to improve:

- Weak perks need to be reworked to incentivize people to use them. It's fun to have things changed up.
- Buff weak killers (myers, trapper, wraith, leatherface, pig, demogorgon...) okay a lot needs reworked but they just need small changes.
- Need to bring back events like the nectar thing. Most events have just been redecorating the gens and hooks. I understand they're busy pushing out dlc instead of improving the stuff that's already there, for good reason, but that's why they can just reuse their stuff.
- Needs a ghostface dudeweed cosmetic.

Pros:
- They've had great killer designs aesthetically and they push out a lot of content.
- They've improved a lot of basic things over the years like the menu and you don't have to rejoin parties all the time now...
- The main good thing is the genre of this game and there hasn't been any other game to do it well enough to compete yet.

Este jogo no estilo "pique-esconde" segue uma premissa até que simples, mas muito divertida. Poder jogar com personagens icônicos como Leatherface e Freddy Krueger deixam a gameplay mais emocionante. Junte 3 amigos e jogue como Sobreviventes ou, se estiverem em 5, joguem em privado com um de vocês sendo o Assassino. As mecânicas de Perk são o ingrediente extra, a gosto do chef. Compre em promoção que fica um preço big bão. Se gostar do jogo, compre as DLCs que lhe interessarem e chame os amigos.

Es impresionante como ya a mas de 3 años de la publicación de este juego, siga teniendo errores tan grotescos en la jugabilidad. Cada nueva actualizacion trae consigo bugs bastante molestos y que de plano te sentencian en la partida y no queda mas que desconectarse o perder instantaneamente. 

Con la salida del nuevo asesino (claro porque para asesinos si tienen tiempo), salio un bug  en los ganchos del sotano, donde los jugadores quedaban atrapados sin poder moverse. Arreglaron ese bug en una actualización y al instante hay un nuevo bug para los asesinos, que se quedan pegados al dañar generadores. Digo yo, seran retrasados los desarrolladores?, como es posible que no puedan sacar una actualización correcta?. Cada dia se hace menos divertido este juego, porque la idea esta buenisima, pero los constantes bugs y malos ratos que te hace pasar matan toda la magia. No me queda mas que no recomendar este juego.

Actualizacion 2020

Pareciera que no podian cagarla mas con este juego, pero al parecer si pudieron. Con la ultima actualizacion se ha vuelto injugable. Su juegas de survivor, es casi seguro que te van a tunelear y a campear. Si juegas como asesino, a menos que tunelees y campees es re dificil sacar mas de 1 kill. Todo desencadena en un mismo problema. El gen rush que hay ahora es horrible. Si como asesino te sale un premade de jugadores, despidete de una buena partida. Si como survivor eres el primer en caer, despidete de la partida tambien. Este juego lamentablemente paso a ya no ser entretenido.

So Ive been playing this game ever since middle school (5 years ago) and i finally came to the idea of writing a review this game is fun with friends and if your trying to just play by yourself, but sometimes it could be a bummer too since this game has been very common with bugs for over the past 5 years which personally i never really had a problem with but everytime they try to fix it they manage to create another bug the developers tried to work around face camping and nerfs which seemed to work but some things were not necessary if they can finalize this game i would give it a 10/10 right now though it is a 8/10 game not saying that i don't love this game because i do i grew up with this game but if your looking for something fun to play with your friends and you like horror genres this is your best bet.

This game saved my life.

I am 27.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and adopted our son together. They are now both 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I found myself lost and miserable. I was self destructive. I got so mad one day from everything spiraling out of my control that I punched some concrete in a moment of overwhelming emotion. That caused me to break my 5th metacarpal in my right hand... my working hand... my games hand.. the hand that I held and carried my children to bed with.. The hand I desperately needed to make sure I could continue to provide.

After learning of the severity of my self-inflicted damage, I was borderline suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man with no history of depression or anxiety. I have never had fits of rage, or been one to break down and cry, but I was in a low spot that just really buried me from being able to see the light on the other side.

Having nothing better to do, I searched for a game I could play, ONE HANDED while I recovered. I somehow stumbled upon this game and read some of the reviews. I decided that it had to be worth a shot... I must admit, I didn't beat the game, or play nearly as long as some of you. In fact, I may have only played this game a day or two.. With that being said, after doing so, I had a new found joy and hope for life. I was able to put behind me the pain and suffering that had been cast over me. I was able to experience other peoples joy and happiness. I was able to see the fruits of my "labor". I relaxed for 5 ♥♥♥♥ing minutes to this music long enough to realize that I was going to be okay.

After coming to that realization, I turned the game off, and I went back to work. It hurt my hand like hell but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so damn sorry for myself, and I became the father I needed to be in that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving as.

Today, I am close friend with my kids mother. We don't fight, or argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents, and friends.

I now have 3 kids. My third child is, wait for it, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my own separation, and we just stumbled in to each others life unexpectedly. We have been in a relationship for a year now, and are very happy together.

Moral of the story, you never know what life holds in store for you, and if I would have given up when all the odds were stacked against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Thank you

TL;DR: The game is fun and has lots of content, but the grind/investment to access this content is not worth it. 

Did you come to this game because you watched a streamer playing it, and thought it seemed really cool? Then turn back, because in order to even get close to the point where you can play like they do requires a stupidly long grind, or a significant investment into DLC characters for a mildly reduced grind.

This is not a game that can be played casually. If you really enjoy every aspect of the game and are willing to commit to grinding out all the characters, then I would recommend it. The game is fairly well balanced, runs well and looks great, so your first hours will be really fun. However, as you become more invested in the game and more involved with its mechanics and progression, some of the late game customisation options start to seem mandatory in order to make the build(s) you want to play. The result is that less enthusiastic players are forced to spend lots of time playing characters and builds they don't enjoy in order to play the ones they do.

How do I say this. The game is extremely fun if you can get 4 people together with a group working together for everyone alive. But being by yourself solo it's not as fun as you really start to see the issues that your much more powerless playing as a survivor. The one thing i hope for in this game is some more perks on survivors side that are better. Some of the more recent perks have not really been extremely beneficial to survivors they either are worse perks that already exist or are just okay. I think the new chapter cursed legacy is probably a step in the right direction for survivors as we now have a pallet reset perk. These are the type of perks i want to see more as they really help it to feel more balanced for lower ranks and higher ranks since the killers just have such powerful perks it really makes it unbalanced. I know this is an unpopular opinion but i think barbaque and chili can be balanced since it is so powerful by just making it so you can only use the hooking aura showing 4 times like how the bloodpoints booster works for it. This would balance this perk so easily. It would still be a great perk but not as amazing as it is now. This would obviously make a lot of killer mains angry but it would only be good for the long run since more people would want to play survivor.

Now this of Course is all my own opinion but i still think it can be seen as helpful to developers and people who read this.
I do Strongly reccomend the the game to people who like horror icons and want to feel like the survivors or the killers as you do play a 1v4 against 1 killer with 4 survivors work together to survive. it is a extremely fun game with friends and it can feel great to get good as a killer or a survivor. But just a warning people really like to play killer so long killer queues and shorter survivor queues. But i play both and I have fun playing both. So i hope to see anyone who is reading this in the abyss. Goodnight and I Hope you survive the night.

Greetings Again! Today we’ll be looking into Dead by Daylight an asymmetric competitive game in the same vein as Evolve that places one scary killer against four slippery survivors in a cat and mouse game that would make Tom & Jerry proud. This game has a fairly unique style but is it worth your money and more importantly your time? Let’s find out! 

Everyday I’m Hooking: The game is a large departure on the normal design of player-verses-player and though not the first game to do it; being the first real success story of the genre. You play as either a survivor or a killer in a four against one match where a single killer attempts to eliminate the four survivors by placing them on meat hooks throughout the map long enough (or often enough) to have a creature called the entity to consume them. The survivors are attempting to well...survive but also win by escaping either through gates opened by powering generators or a special trap door hidden on the map. Each killer has unique abilities, ranging from lunge attacks to invisibility but the survivors are all identical aside from beginning perks they can select (and eventually unlock for other survivors) and cosmetics. Ultimately, the killer cannot be defeated only slowed down and is racing against time to eliminate the survivors before they complete their objectives. 

Scary Music: Everything about this game is about the atmosphere, the ambiance; from the lighting to the music and sound effect, even the voice acting is all sharpened to a keen edge to make the killer feel like a force of nature and the survivors like scurrying rats avoiding said force. The game is balanced very well and although the survivors will typically loose overall it is common for little victories to be achieved or even that lone survivor to escape the final few moments. The leveling system is also very interesting as you unlock all your items and perks through leveling in a system that has you gaining points for playing and unlocking items in a web, once the web is completed you level up, moving up to a more complex web. This creates an elegant system where new players aren’t penalized as much in abilities / items but veteran players have more toys to play with. In the end the main difference is going to be the skill and preferences of the players not obtaining that +5 shotgun of face smashing. 

Shock Therapy: I despise the doctor, there I said it. In my eyes he is the single most frustrating killer in the entire game that boarders on a toxic play experience; one that usually has nothing to do with the player controlling him during the match. That aside the game is very stable and has a community that is active all hours of the day. I do see the occasional intentional drop from frustrated players, which gives all remaining players a bonus in points but this also tends to weigh heavily in favor the killer for that individual game. There can be a level of frustration against certain killers and a single wrong move can ruin a game; thankfully you are only ever a few minutes from a new game. I would like to see more detailed tutorials as, although great, the current tutorials are lacking and the game requires a fair bit of research outside of the game to improve. To be honest I never found this a deal breaker however, in some ways it was actually fun to figure out previously frustrating elements of the game. This is game is a great example of the ‘just one more game’ effect that leaves you in bed hours after you should be. 

All in all, if you are looking for asymmetric death-match style game there simply isn’t a better one out there. Games in the past have tried, failing and some amazing games have side modes that mimic this design, this game stands above them all like a killer at a downed victim slowly bleeding out. Highly recommend, enjoy!

Сразу скажу, это второй аккаунт, на первом в ДБД наиграно больше 600 часов.
Постараюсь быть краток.
Итак, плюсы:
+ геймлей интересен и разнообразен, как за счет разнообразия персонажей, так и за счет игроков, каждый матч будет не таким как прошлый (как впрочем и во всех сессионных играх)
+ игры в среднем минут по 20-30 максимум
+ интересный сеттинг (лора немного, и очевидно оценка субъективная, но мне по душе)
+ много косметических предметов, так что любимого выжившего можно приодеть как душе угодно (плюс сомнительный, конечно, но все же плюс)
Минусы:
- Очень много гринда, прокачать все перки на одном персонаже займет минимум месяц ежедневной игры
- Всё еще приличное количество багов (разработчики активные и стараются, но отшлифовать игру пока не могут). К кривым хитбоксам в целом можно привыкнуть, да и BHVR обещают починить эту проблему (вызвана она недавно введенными выделенными серверами, так что это последствия работы над игрой).
Итого:
Если не играли - посмотрите стримы или видео, можете подождать бесплатных выходных, попробовать поиграть хотя бы часов 5-10 и решить подходит Вам такой жанр или нет.
Если зайдет - рекомендую найти официальный канал дискорда по данной игре и играть компанией, так намного веселей (хотя лично я в удовольствие играю и соло выжившим, сложнее но интереснее)
